posts.content:
Pair of cargo doors 66 year low hinge no rust .have been 're skinned at some stage prior to me buying them and haven't been done well .so will need work to get them to fit nice on a bus. This may involve repositioning of the hinges and separating the door skin from the frame to make them them sit well..

Do not buy these thinking they will fit straight away..

Â£425.00 for the pair .

Collection only Northampton or Watford in the week
